input.sentences: the view from the shore was spectacular .
you could see the entire mountain range .
some of the mountains still had snow on top .
it was beautiful and i ca n't wait to go back there .
output.sentences: I wanted to capture a panoramic view of the mountains.
The beach was blocking my view of the mountain.
I repositioned and tried to take another picture but this time the water line was crooked.
I tried again and still no avail.
I took one more picture and still wasn't happy with it.
